name: Successful registration of a user

children.description: Given that the Analyst has access to the API

children.description: Then he should see the successful response code 200
Then the response code obtained should be (200)
And that the successful registration response contains the id 4 and token QpwL5tke4Pnpja7X4 fields
Then el id del usuario should be (4)
Then el token del usuario should be 'QpwL5tke4Pnpja7X4'

userStory.storyName: Register of a user in the reqres.in API
userStory.narrative:
As a Certification Analyst for Reqres.in
  I need to test the register user functionality
  to validate its correct operation
